text: Shi ta jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”], qizhong you xuduo mingshi de jing wen, tamen shi quan jing zhi mu [jichu, genben]. Lingwai yixie ze shi yinhui [anshi, yinyu] de jing wen. Zhiyu xin cun xienian de ren, tamen ze zunxing yinhui de jing wen, wei mihuo renxin er dui jing wen suiyi shiyi. Chu an la wai, meiyou ren zhidao ta de jieshi. Jingtong zhishi de ren shuo:“Women quexin zhe bu jingdian, bulun shi mingshi de haishi yinhui de, dou shi cong women de zhu jiang shi de.” Wei you lizhi de renmen caineng linghui.
